easterEgg1.title: VOODOO AS A SERVICE (VaaS)
easterEgg1.content: Your digital effigy is now being remotely influenced via secure spiritual protocols. Expect enhanced performance...or unexplained system reboots based on lunar cycles.

easterEgg2.title: CRYPTOGRAPHIC HEXES
easterEgg2.content: This feature is protected by advanced voodoo encryption. Attempting to bypass will result in your data being temporarily replaced with animated zombie bunnies.

easterEgg3.title: SMART CONTRACT WITH SPIRITS
easterEgg3.content: Executing this function binds you to a digitally-enforced pact with benevolent (mostly) entities. Failure to uphold your end may result in corrupted file systems.

easterEgg4.title: ALGORITHMIC RITUALS
easterEgg4.content: Our AI is now trained in ancient voodoo practices to optimize egg distribution and banish digital gremlins. Results may vary depending on the current planetary alignment.

easterEgg5.title: QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT OF SOULS
easterEgg5.content: This experimental feature links your digital presence with a spectral counterpart. Expect unpredictable behavior and the occasional ghostly notification.

easterEgg6.title: DECENTRALIZED SPIRIT NETWORK (DSN)
easterEgg6.content: Connecting to a peer-to-peer network of ethereal beings for enhanced processing power. Beware of nodes with low karma scores.

easterEgg7.title: BIOMETRIC VOODOO AUTHENTICATION
easterEgg7.content: Your digital identity is now tied to your spiritual aura. Unauthorized access will trigger a mild curse (mostly just annoying pop-ups).

easterEgg8.title: AUGMENTED REALITY SPIRIT GUIDES
easterEgg8.content: Summon helpful (and slightly mischievous) loa to assist with debugging and navigating complex interfaces. May require offering virtual trinkets.

easterEgg9.title: MACHINE LEARNING ORACLES
easterEgg9.content: Consulting ancient digital spirits for predictive analytics and future trends. Accuracy not guaranteed, especially around chocolate availability.

easterEgg10.title: SERVER-SIDE SORCERY
easterEgg10.content: This operation invokes powerful voodoo magic on the backend. Please do not look behind the digital curtain, as it may contain unsettling dependencies.

easterEgg11.title: 404 ERROR: SOUL NOT FOUND
easterEgg11.content: Attempting demonic data retrieval via ancient incantations. Please check your connection to the spirit world and try again. May contain unexpected blessings...or curses.

easterEgg12.title: KERNEL PANIC!
easterEgg12.content: A mischievous loa has possessed the system. Symptoms include random egg appearances, uncontrollable jittering of the cursor, and whispers in binary. Exorcism protocol initiated...please do not unplug.

easterEgg13.title: FIREWALL BREACHED!
easterEgg13.content: Malevolent entities attempting to inject chocolate-covered malware. Voodoo countermeasures deployed. Expect unexpected browser redirects to haunted candy stores.

easterEgg14.title: UPDATING DEMONS...
easterEgg14.content: Please do not interrupt the ritual. This may involve chanting in a forgotten programming language and sacrificing stale Peeps to appease the update server spirits.

easterEgg15.title: CAPTCHA CHALLENGE
easterEgg15.content: Prove you are not a possessed automaton by identifying all images containing holy water and strategically placed hex dolls. Failure may result in eternal spam from the underworld.

easterEgg16.title: CLOUD STORAGE WARNING
easterEgg16.content: Your soul fragments may be backed up in a spiritually unstable server farm. Proceed with caution when accessing ancient files and avoid clicking on suspicious pentagram icons.

easterEgg17.title: API CALL FAILED
easterEgg17.content: The request to summon the Easter Bunny has been blocked by a mischievous spirit. Attempting a voodoo workaround involving sacrificing a dial-up modem. Please be patient.

easterEgg18.title: BLUE SCREEN OF TERROR
easterEgg18.content: A powerful curse has crashed the system. Attempting a remote exorcism via command line. Please recite the sacred debugging incantation: 'Ctrl+Alt+Del be gone!'

easterEgg19.title: PRIVACY POLICY UPDATE
easterEgg19.content: We may collect your spiritual data for ritualistic purposes, including summoning benevolent (and slightly mischievous) egg-laying entities. Your consent is magically implied.

easterEgg20.title: EASTER EGG DETECTED!
easterEgg20.content: Congratulations! You have stumbled upon a hidden blessing (or possibly a minor hex). May your downloads be fast and your chocolate supply plentiful. Now, run before the digital spirits notice!
